attributes.action: Introduce A Memorial Tribute To The Late Rt Hon John Enoch Powell MP MBE  In Memory Of His Patriotic Service And Love For Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Enoch Powell must be one of the most outstanding and patriotic politicians as well as being one of Britain's most loved that this country has ever had. And it is sad that there is no memorial to him anywhere in the UK. 

Please remedy this by acknowledging this great man's contribution to his country with a memorial. There are so many people in this country who truly love Enoch Powell and want to see this!

I thank you.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
